text: as we're seeing this rapid evolution in
the market around cloud and Cloud
migration a lot of our clients are
selecting AWS specifically as their
platform of choice and I think I would
attribute that to both the vast catalog
of services and solutions that AWS has
bringing to the market themselves as
well as the growing list of Enterprises
who are going all in on AWS we believe
our customers are looking for partners
that have been certified by AWS so that
they know they're getting um the best
capab abilities they can get to support
them on their journey to AWS the AWS
migration competency is an area that
we're super excited to be a part of
having AWS recognize um that we're
bringing some improved Automation and
scalability to the migration process
while helping our clients fully leverage
the platform is something that's
certainly important to us so being an
APN partner uh has given Accenture a
closer relationship with AWS we've been
able to take advantage of the AWS
training and deep technical knowledge to
expand our capabilities and build our
resources our offering covers a wide
range of services from cloud strategy to
Discovery and architecture design to
application migration and Cloud
operations and even includes application
development where the applications are
being powered by backend AWS Services
the more Automation and integration that
that you can achieve out of these
migrations you know the more business
value that you're going to drive
[Music]
